pages.text: The Teddy Bear grants its wearer configurable buffs upon sleeping.$(br2)Item idea originally by Rembo
$(l)Default Effects:$()$(br)$(d)Regeneration$()$(br)$(2)Luck$()$(br)$(4)Health Boost II$()$(br2)$(l)Mod Compatibility:$()$(br)$(n)Lycanites$(): Prevents Fear and Insomnia status effects
$(o)Some are still traumatized from its original fear-striking stare.
